mapper.select: /* HongLoginUserVo.findUser */ select user_uid ,user_id ,password ,user_name ,user_email ,role ,is_enable ,pwd_last_update ,last_login_date ,is_non_locked from hong_user where user_id = #{userId}

/* HongLoginUserVo.findSocialUser */ select hu.user_uid ,hu.user_id ,hu.password ,hu.user_name ,hu.user_email ,hu.role ,hu.is_enable ,hu.pwd_last_update ,hu.last_login_date ,hu.is_non_locked from hong_social_user hsu inner join hong_user hu on hu.social_user_uid = hsu.social_user_uid where hsu.user_id = #{userId} and hu.social_user_uid is not null
